name: CARRIBELLE TULIPS BOOKMARK " Cherish the moments..."
description:
Carribelle tulips Bookmark is just so beautiful in rich colors, sun yellow, tomato orange and shades of chocolate brown. Carribelle reminds us that the only time we really have is captured in the moment we experience it. We need to cherish each moment, knowing that we will never feel or experience it quite the same way again. After a moment passes, a new moment comes, with a new story and feeling. "Cherish the moments, they come only once!, is the quote that reads at the top of the bookmark

This bookmark is brought to life, with a combination of mediums and techniques. Each part is hand drawn, then graphically manipulated and layered in the computer. When arranged in the computer, it reveals a tapestry of floral images, rendering a collage mixed-media look. 

The Carribelle bookmark image measures 2x6, is printed on white ink jet photo matte paper and is white on the back.  My signature is in black on the back.  The bookmark is then laminated to give it durability and it comes a little over the sides to protect the edges. 

This bookmark is strung with satin ribbons that come streaming down to meet up with some lovely unique beads.    NOTE:  Each bookmark is made with a variation of beads and may not be the exact selection of beads that are featured in the photograph. Each piece is unique and will be a surprise.  The variety can be glass, bamboo, wooden, acrylic, shell and metallic beads that will hang from the ribbons and look so nice outside of your book.

Your bookmark will be packaged in a bubble envelope and with a sheet of cardboard to prevent it from bending.
If you have any questions, please contact me. I am happy to help you. 

Remember to always, "Cherish the moments!".

ENJOY!!!

name: ABILIENE HEARTS BOOKMARK "Challenge your heart..."
description:
Hearts and more hearts in hot pink and fushia! Abiliene is all about matters of the heart, and how important it is to stretch our feelings and emotions, and to reach higher levels of being. Our hearts are what we use every moment to gauge our movement in this world.
This bookmark is brought to life, with a combination of mediums and techniques. Each part is hand drawn, then graphically manipulated and layered in the computer. When arranged in the computer, it reveals a tapestry of floral images, rendering a collage mixed-media look.  

The Abiliene bookmark image measures 2x6, is printed on white ink jet photo matte paper and is white on the back.  My signature is in black on the back.  The bookmark is then laminated to give it durability and it comes a little over the sides to protect the edges. 

This bookmark is strung with satin ribbons that come streaming down to meet up with some lovely unique beads.    NOTE:  Each bookmark is made with a variation of beads and may not be the exact selection of beads that are featured in the photograph. Each piece is unique and will be a surprise.  The variety can be glass, bamboo, wooden, acrylic, shell and metallic beads that will hang from the ribbons and look so nice outside of your book.

Your bookmark will be packaged in a bubble envelope and with a sheet of cardboard to prevent it from bending.
If you have any questions, please contact me. I am happy to help you. 

Remember to always, "Challenge your heart, as well as your mind!".
ENJOY!!!

name: MARILYN HYDRANGEAS BOOKMARK "The beauty of flowers..."
description:
Often when we want to express ourselves, we can't find the words to say just the right thing. We may feel uncomfortable about truly expressing our deep feelings. This is what the Marilyn Hydrangea flower bookmark is all about. "Beautiful flowers are nature's way of helping us express what we have trouble putting into words!" is Marilyn's quote about how people can express themselves, without having to speak a word, just by giving a bouquet of flowers.

Marilyn's Hydrangeas is so beautiful and elegant. It is illustrated in rich, lush shades of purples and pinks. This bookmark, Marilyn, is brought to life, with a combination of mediums and techniques. Each part of the illustration is hand drawn, then graphically manipulated and layered in the computer. When arranged in the computer, it reveals a tapestry of floral images, rendering a collage mixed-media look.

The Marilyn bookmark image measures 2x6, is printed on white ink jet photo matte paper and is white on the back.  My signature is in black on the back.  The bookmark is then laminated to give it durability and it comes a little over the sides to protect the edges. 
This bookmark is strung with satin ribbons that come streaming down to meet up with some lovely unique beads.    NOTE:  Each bookmark is made with a variation of beads and may not be the exact selection of beads that are featured in the photograph. Each piece is unique and will be a surprise.  The variety can be glass, bamboo, wooden, acrylic, shell and metallic beads that will hang from the ribbons and look so nice outside of your book.

Your bookmark will be packaged in a bubble envelope and with a sheet of cardboard to prevent it from bending.
If you have any questions, please contact me. I am happy to help you. 

Remember, "Beautiful flowers helps us express ourselves..!"

ENJOY!!!

name: PENNYROSE POKA-DOT FLOWER BOOKMARK " When you find your spirit, ...!"
description:
"When you find your spirit, you will find a friend!' This quote is the inspirational message that expresses the feelings you get when looking at Pennyrose Poka-Dot flowers. Finding our spirit helps us to get in touch with deeper parts of ourselves, When in times of need and lonliness, as well as, joyfulness, when have a friend inside us, that can be found in our spirit. Pennyrose's ambience makes us feel like we are staring up at the sky on a sunny day, that helps to comfort us. The soothing shades of summer sky blue, sunny yellow and very subtle shade of wine color, just warms the spirit

This bookmark is just so calming and refreshing to look at. It makes one feel peaceful. This is an illustration brought to life, with a combination of mediums and techniques. Each part of the bookmark is hand drawn, then graphically manipulated and layered in the computer. When arranged in the computer, it reveals a tapestry of floral images, rendering a collage mixed-media look.

The Pennyrose bookmark image measures 2x6, is printed on white ink jet photo matte paper and is white on the back.  My signature is in black on the back.  The bookmark is then laminated to give it durability and it comes a little over the sides to protect the edges. 
This bookmark is strung with satin ribbons that come streaming down to meet up with some lovely unique beads.    NOTE:  Each bookmark is made with a variation of beads and may not be the exact selection of beads that are featured in the photograph. Each piece is unique and will be a surprise.  The variety can be glass, bamboo, wooden, acrylic, shell and metallic beads that will hang from the ribbons and look so nice outside of your book.

Your bookmark will be packaged in a bubble envelope and with a sheet of cardboard to prevent it from bending.
If you have any questions, please contact me. I am happy to help you. 

Remember " When you find your spirit, you will find a friend...!"

ENJOY!!!

name: JULIANA TULIPS BOOKMARK  "Remember to tend to the flowers..."
description:
Juliana Tulips reminds us of the importance of taking care of ourself on the inside, as well as, the outside. I often think about how we should be kind to our hearts, as if they are a bushel of fragile flowers. We usually tend to flowers with loving care and they touch our emotions and feelings. I wonder how we can give the same time and attention everyday to our hearts, that is like the care and feeding of things in our outside world. Hmm... something to think about. 

When I think about Juliana's color palate, it brings up images of drinking a glass of pink lemonade on a bright sunny day. I can also imagine sitting on a country porch, while talking with old friends and reminiscing. "Remember to tend to the flowers, that bloom in your heart!" is the expressional quote that reads at the top of the bookmark.

The Juliana bookmark image measures 2x6, is printed on white ink jet photo matte paper and is white on the back.  My signature is in black on the back.  The bookmark is then laminated to give it durability and it comes a little over the sides to protect the edges. 
This bookmark is strung with satin ribbons that come streaming down to meet up with some lovely unique beads.    NOTE:  Each bookmark is made with a variation of beads and may not be the exact selection of beads that are featured in the photograph. Each piece is unique and will be a surprise.  The variety can be glass, bamboo, wooden, acrylic, shell and metallic beads that will hang from the ribbons and look so nice outside of your book.

Your bookmark will be packaged in a bubble envelope and with a sheet of cardboard to prevent it from bending.
If you have any questions, please contact me. I am happy to help you. 

Remember " Tend to the flowers...!"

ENJOY!!!
